entries.text: Requires explicit written consent for use beyond review

Unauthorized electronic sharing triggers forfeiture of rights without publisher authorization.

entries.text: Avoid self-imposed tyranny by balancing authority with empathy.
Correct through guidance rather than force alone.
Prioritize essential knowledge over breadth, limiting superfluous learning.
Wisdom is attained through internal reflection rather than external aids or books.
Avoid disrupting established order in hereditary monarchies.
New rulers must manage expectations and prevent rebellion.
Rulers must actively ensure citizens remain dependent on their leadership during both prosperous and challenging times.
Direct command is preferable to indirect rule when facing critical moments, as it minimizes reliance on potentially unreliable proxies.
Avoid committing principles to writing if they may become obsolete.
Do not establish fixed doctrines that could hinder future improvements.
Always cross-verify sources and maintain rigorous standards for data collection to avoid misinterpretation.
